title: What is the DOM?
problem: I used `document.getElementById` and it returned null. Here's what I learned about the DOM, how it works, and how to manipulate it effectively.

title: Understanding Event Bubbling and Capturing
problem: I clicked a button and the parent div also fired its event. Here's what I learned about event bubbling and capturing, and how to manage event propagation.

title: JavaScript Closures: The Secret to Private Variables
problem: I tried to access a variable outside a function and it was undefined. Here's what I learned about closures, how they work, and how to use them for private variables.

title: Semantic HTML: Why It Matters Beyond Accessibility
problem: I used divs for everything and my site ranked poorly in search results. Here's what I learned about semantic HTML, why it exists, and how it impacts SEO, accessibility, and maintainabilityâ€”not just screen readers.

title: CSS Box Model: Mastering Layout and Spacing
problem: My elements kept overflowing and I couldn't figure out why. Here's what I learned about the CSS Box Model, how it works, and how to control layout and spacing effectively.

title: CSS Specificity: Why Your Styles Aren't Applying
problem: I wrote CSS rules, but they weren't applying. Here's what I learned about CSS specificity, how it's calculated, and how to troubleshoot styling issues.

title: Flexbox Fundamentals: Building Responsive Layouts
problem: I struggled to align items horizontally and vertically. Here's what I learned about Flexbox, its core properties, and how to build flexible and responsive layouts.

title: CSS Grid Layout: The Power of Two-Dimensional Design
problem: I needed a complex grid layout and Flexbox wasn't cutting it. Here's what I learned about CSS Grid, its powerful features, and how to create advanced two-dimensional designs.

title: Understanding `this` in JavaScript: A Contextual Deep Dive
problem: I called a function and `this` was undefined. Here's what I learned about the `this` keyword, its different contexts, and how to manage it effectively.

title: Asynchronous JavaScript: Callbacks, Promises, and Async/Await
problem: My code was blocking the UI and I didn't know why. Here's what I learned about asynchronous JavaScript, callbacks, Promises, and Async/Await for non-blocking operations.

title: Event Loop in JavaScript: How Asynchronous Code Works
problem: I thought `setTimeout` ran immediately, but it didn't. Here's what I learned about the JavaScript Event Loop, its role in asynchronous execution, and how it manages tasks.

title: JavaScript Modules: Organizing Your Codebase
problem: My global namespace was polluted with variables. Here's what I learned about JavaScript modules, `import`/`export`, and how to organize your codebase effectively.

title: Data Structures in JavaScript: Arrays, Objects, and Maps
problem: I needed to store and retrieve data efficiently. Here's what I learned about common JavaScript data structures like Arrays, Objects, and Maps, and when to use each.

title: Algorithms in JavaScript: Sorting and Searching Basics
problem: I needed to sort a list of items quickly. Here's what I learned about basic sorting and searching algorithms in JavaScript, and their time complexities.

title: Introduction to React: Building Your First Component
problem: I wanted to build interactive UIs efficiently. Here's what I learned about React, its component-based architecture, and how to build your first functional component.

title: React State and Props: Managing Component Data
problem: My component data wasn't updating correctly. Here's what I learned about React state and props, how they manage component data, and when to use each.

title: React Hooks: `useState` and `useEffect` Explained
problem: I needed to add state and side effects to my functional components. Here's what I learned about React Hooks, specifically `useState` and `useEffect`, and how to use them.

title: Conditional Rendering in React: Showing and Hiding UI
problem: I needed to show different UI based on conditions. Here's what I learned about conditional rendering in React, various techniques, and when to use each.

title: List Rendering in React: Displaying Collections of Data
problem: I needed to display a list of items dynamically. Here's what I learned about list rendering in React, the importance of `keys`, and how to optimize performance.

title: React Router: Navigating Your Single-Page Application
problem: I needed to add navigation to my React app. Here's what I learned about React Router, its core components, and how to build a multi-page experience in a SPA.

title: Context API in React: State Management Without Prop Drilling
problem: I was passing props down multiple levels. Here's what I learned about React Context API, how it solves prop drilling, and when to use it for global state.

title: Optimizing React Performance: Memoization and Virtualization
problem: My React app was slow and re-rendering too often. Here's what I learned about optimizing React performance using `React.memo`, `useCallback`, `useMemo`, and list virtualization.

title: Introduction to Next.js: Building Production-Ready React Apps
problem: I needed a framework for server-side rendering and routing. Here's what I learned about Next.js, its key features, and how to build production-ready React applications.

title: Next.js Data Fetching: `getServerSideProps` vs `getStaticProps`
problem: I was confused about how to fetch data in Next.js. Here's what I learned about `getServerSideProps`, `getStaticProps`, `getStaticPaths`, and when to use each for data fetching.

title: Styling in Next.js: CSS Modules, Styled-JSX, and Tailwind CSS
problem: I needed to style my Next.js app effectively. Here's what I learned about different styling approaches in Next.js, including CSS Modules, Styled-JSX, and integrating Tailwind CSS.

title: API Routes in Next.js: Building Your Own Backend Endpoints
problem: I needed a simple backend for my Next.js app. Here's what I learned about API Routes in Next.js, how to create serverless functions, and integrate them with your frontend.

title: Deploying Next.js Apps: Vercel and Beyond
problem: I finished my Next.js app and needed to deploy it. Here's what I learned about deploying Next.js applications to platforms like Vercel, and other deployment strategies.

title: Introduction to TypeScript: Adding Type Safety to JavaScript
problem: My JavaScript code had runtime errors due to type mismatches. Here's what I learned about TypeScript, its benefits, basic types, and how to integrate it into a project.

title: Advanced TypeScript: Interfaces, Types, and Generics
problem: I needed more robust type definitions for complex data structures. Here's what I learned about advanced TypeScript features like interfaces, type aliases, enums, and generics.

title: TypeScript with React: Type-Safe Components and Hooks
problem: I wanted to use TypeScript in my React projects. Here's what I learned about integrating TypeScript with React, typing components, props, state, and custom hooks for type safety.
